text: Il cimento dell'armonia e dell'inventione (English "The contest between harmony and invention"), Op. 8, is a set of violin concertos written by Antonio Vivaldi. The first four concertos are known as The Four Seasons. It was first published in 1725 in Amsterdam. == References == Category:Violin concertos Category:Compositions by Antonio Vivaldi
title: Il cimento dell'armonia e dell'inventione
